Package storesystem.api

Class ItemRegistry

java.lang.Object
storesystem.api.ItemRegistry
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ItemRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Controls the valid Items as well as creates and stores them. Also in charge of Deal Objects.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • loadRegistry

      public static ItemRegistry loadRegistry​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      Loads a Registry from a given file object.
      Parameters:
      file - the file where the object was serialized
      Returns:
      the item registry ItemRegistry
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be found
      java.io.IOException - if an i/o exception occurs

    • getDefaultRegistry

      public static ItemRegistry getDefaultRegistry()
      gets the default registry
      Returns:
      gets the default registry. If none can be found, one will be created.

    • save
